Variables
SharpNeat.​Neat.​Speciation
namespace SharpNeat.Neat.Speciation
SpeciesStats
public
SpeciesStats

Species statistics.

Variables
MeanFitness
public double MeanFitness
TargetSizeReal
public double TargetSizeReal

The species target size. This is the real value from the target size calculation; this is 'resolved' to integer value TargetSizeInt to give the final/actual target size in the next generation.

TargetSizeInt
public int TargetSizeInt
EliteSizeInt
public int EliteSizeInt

The number of fittest genomes in the species to be kept in the species in the next generation.  Thus the number of slots for new offspring is TargetSizeInt - EliteSizeInt.

OffspringCount
public int OffspringCount

The number of offspring genomes to produce for this species.  This value is simply TargetSizeInt - EliteSizeInt.  This count is broken down further into OffspringAsexualCount and OffspringSexualCount, i.e. OffspringCount = OffspringAsexualCount + OffspringSexualCount.

OffspringAsexualCount
public int OffspringAsexualCount

The number of offspring to produce through asexual reproduction.

OffspringSexualCount
public int OffspringSexualCount

The number of offspring to produce through sexual reproduction.

SelectionSizeInt
public int SelectionSizeInt
